channel.title: Projects on Ingo Schommer
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ingo Schommer

item.title: Contributions to Silverstripe CMS
item.description: Contributed nearly a thousand pull requests and collaborated with hundreds of community members on the many repos making up Silverstripe CMS (PHP and Javascript).

item.title: Github Issue Tracker
item.description: VueJS frontend to aggregate Github issues through their GraphQL API, deployed on Vercel

item.title: Property Trends Dashboard
item.description: Applied data analysis to my own house hunting, visualised with R and Shiny.

item.title: Book: Silverstripe - The Complete Guide to CMS Development
item.description: Authored the first book about Silverstripe CMS, with thousands of copies sold (originally published in Germany for Galileo Computing
